description: VMAgentRemoteWriteSpec defines the remote storage configuration for VmAgent

aws.description: AWS describes params specific to AWS cloud

basicAuth.description: BasicAuth allow an endpoint to authenticate over basic authentication

bearerTokenSecret.description: Optional bearer auth token to use for -remoteWrite.url

forceVMProto.description: ForceVMProto forces using VictoriaMetrics protocol for sending data to -remoteWrite.url

headers.description: Headers allow configuring custom http headers Must be in form of semicolon separated header with value e.g. headerName: headerValue vmagent supports since 1.79.0 version

inlineUrlRelabelConfig.description: InlineUrlRelabelConfig defines relabeling config for remoteWriteURL, it can be defined at crd spec.

maxDiskUsage.description: MaxDiskUsage defines the maximum file-based buffer size in bytes for the given remoteWrite It overrides global configuration defined at remoteWriteSettings.maxDiskUsagePerURL

proxyURL.description: ProxyURL for -remoteWrite.url. Supported proxies: http, https, socks5. Example: socks5://proxy:1234

sendTimeout.description: Timeout for sending a single block of data to -remoteWrite.url (default 1m0s)

streamAggrConfig.description: StreamAggrConfig defines stream aggregation configuration for VMAgent for -remoteWrite.url

tlsConfig.description: TLSConfig describes tls configuration for remote write target

url.description: URL of the endpoint to send samples to.

urlRelabelConfig.description: ConfigMap with relabeling config which is applied to metrics before sending them to the corresponding -remoteWrite.url
